biotools.summary: Suite of computer programs for haplotype inference from genotypes on pedigree data. It consists of several different algorithms that are designed based on a combinatorial formulation of haplotype inference, namely the minimum-recombinant haplotype configuration (MRHC) problem, and are effective for different types of data.

bioschemas.name: PedPhase
bioschemas.summary: Suite of computer programs for haplotype inference from genotypes on pedigree data. It consists of several different algorithms that are designed based on a combinatorial formulation of haplotype inference, namely the minimum-recombinant haplotype configuration (MRHC) problem, and are effective for different types of data.
